title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for pulling and running Llama-2, CodeLlama, Mistral, Gemma, etc. locally with one command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library that wraps the Ollama HTTP API; chat, embed, pull, list models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you use Ollama models as LLMs, chat, or embeddings.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama-WebUI) that talks to the local Ollama server; chat, multi-model, admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with typed models, streaming, and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama HTTP API.

title: ollama-cli (go-llama)
summary: Community Go CLI with interactive chat, prompt templates, and shell completion.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for Ollama with async streaming and strongly-typed responses.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up an Ollama service container for CI pipelines.

title: ollama-cog
summary: Cog container that packages Ollama for easy Replicate deployments.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you run local LLMs via Ollama for note Q&A and summarization.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: LogSeq plugin to query and chat with your knowledge base through Ollama.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake providing reproducible Ollama binaries and development shells.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial but actively maintained Rust crate for Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-gpt4all-importer
summary: Utility to convert and import GPT4All model files into Ollama’s Modelfile format.

title: ollama-model-registry
summary: Community-curated list of custom Modelfiles for niche models (CodeLlama-Python, SQLCoder, etc.).
